name: periscopeUP LLC
description:
periscopeUP’s focus is helping our clients grow their business online. 
We do this in two steps: First, we increase the number of visitors to your website, and second, we get more of those visitors to take your desired action (conversion rates) like a purchase, a newsletter sign-up, a phone call, etc. 
We market on a variety of platforms depending on our clients’ product or service. 
Our services range from Mobile SEO & Websites to Web Design & Development.
